#import <Foundation/Foundation.h>

/**
 * UIColor category using user defined styles
 */
@interface UIColor (_StyleExtension)
__COLOR_INTERFACE__
@end

/**
 * UIFont category using user defined styles
 */
@interface UIFont (_StyleExtension)
__FONT_INTERFACE__
@end


/**
 * TSShadow class
 *
 * This container holds information about the shadow to be used with a label
 */
@interface TSShadow : NSObject
@property (nonatomic, strong) UIColor *shadowColor;
@property (nonatomic, assign) CGSize shadowOffset;
__SHADOW_INTERFACE__
@end


/**
 * TSStyle class
 *
 * This class describes the style of a UILabel. Used in combination with a UILabel category
 */
@interface TSStyle : NSObject
@property (nonatomic, strong) UIFont *font;
@property (nonatomic, strong) UIColor *color;
@property (nonatomic, strong) TSShadow *shadow;
__STYLE_INTERFACE__
@end


/**
 * UILabel category using user defined styles
 */
@interface UILabel (_StyleExtension)

/** Return a UILabel with user defined style elements */
-(id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)frame 
          andColor:(UIColor *)color 
           andFont:(UIFont *)font 
         andShadow:(TSShadow *)shadow;

/** Return a UILabel with a user defined style */
-(id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)frame andStyle:(TSStyle *)style;

@end
